description: The LNO_NOADD_SINGLE table contains information about your patient note records. This includes patient summary extracts, lab result reports, and other generated patient documents. All LNO records are included in this table.

columns.name: EXTRACT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient summary extract record.

columns.name: EXTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The internal name of the patient summary extract.

columns.name: REPORT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the report that was used as the extract type.

columns.name: DOC_MGMT_SYSTEM
columns.description: Indicates the document management system if the extract not stored in Epic.

columns.name: TRANSFER_DATE
columns.description: The date that the extract was transferred to the external document management system.

columns.name: EXT_DOC_LINK
columns.description: The link to the document stored in an external document management system.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: EXTRACT_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant in which the patient summary extract was created.

columns.name: TRIGGER_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who triggered the extract. Contains the internal ID of that user.

columns.name: DELETED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The deletion type category ID for the patient summary extract. If this value is null, the record is active.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: DELETION_USER_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the user that deleted the patient summary extract.

columns.name: DELETION_INSTANT
columns.description: The date and time when the patient summary extract was deleted.

columns.name: DELETION_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The deletion reason category ID for the patient summary extract.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


RECORD OLDER THAN CONFIGURED NUMBER OF YEARS


PURGE


ERROR

columns.name: DELETION_COMMENT
columns.description: The reason, given by the user, for deletion of the patient summary extract.
